meanings.definition: Good or well in quality or character.
meanings.sent1: She always tries to be gude to everyone she meets.
meanings.sent2: The cake tasted gude with its sweet frosting.
meanings.sent3: His gude manners made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The gude news spread like wildfire through the town.
meanings.sent5: The gude behavior of the students impressed the teacher.

meanings.sent1: He will gude the hikers through the forest safely.
meanings.sent2: The map will gude you to the treasure chest.
meanings.sent3: The wise owl decided to gude the lost mouse home.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition seemed to gude her in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The stars gude sailors across the vast ocean.

meanings.definition: A person who is good at something.
meanings.sent1: She is known as the gude of baking in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The artist is a gude at creating beautiful paintings.
meanings.sent3: The little boy proudly declared himself the gude of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The gude of puzzles solved the mystery in no time.
meanings.sent5: The gude of gardening shared her tips with the community.
